name: Linhai Song
content: Linhai Song's Home Page Linhai Song Professor songlinhai AT ICT DOT AC DOT CN State Key Lab of Processors Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences Beijing, China CV: [pdf] About Me I am a Professor at the Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences. My research spans systems, security, and software engineering, with the overarching goal of enabling developers to build software systems that are more efficient, reliable, and secure. I earned my Ph.D. from the University of Wisconsin–Madison in 2015, where I worked with Prof. Shan Lu. I received my M.S. from the Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2010, and my B.S. in Software Engineering from Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2007. Before joining ICT@CAS in August 2025, I was a tenured Associate Professor at Pennsylvania State University. Students I am very lucky to work with outstanding students: Current Students: Shihao Xia, PhD PSU (co-advised with Hong Hu) Mengting He, PhD PSU Alumni Shuofei Zhu (2018-2024) >> Dr. Peng Liu's group Ziheng Liu (2019-2021) >> PhD at UCSD Boqin Qin (Visiting PhD from BUPT) (2018-2019) Ziyi Zhang (Visiting Undergraduate from USTC, Undergraduate Silver Medalist in SRC@SOSP'2019) (2019) >> PhD at UW-Madison Jianjun Shi (Visiting PhD from BIT) (2018-2019) Zeming Yu (2018-2019) Yongheng Chen (Visiting Undergraduate from NJU) (2019) >> PhD at Gatech Tengfei Tu (Visiting PhD from BUPT) (2017-2018) >> Faculty at BUPT Advertisement for Recruiting Looking for PhDs, masters, visiting scholars, visiting students, postdocs, and undergraduates at any time.
